comment._content: Ewww.  I can smell that just by looking at it.

comment.author: 7211509@N04
comment._content: Papermills are the smelliest places on earth.  I grew up southeast of Lufkin.

comment.author: 68747046@N03
comment._content: Smells like money to me. I worked there 18 years before Abitibi pulled the plug. These photos remind of when I was younger and I did a job I loved.
